bibliographic-data.invention-title: Online Processing for Offshore Business Transactions

abstract.p: A method and system for processing offshore online transaction use an intermediary platform to conduct foreign currency exchange on behalf of a buyer and an offshore seller. The method allows the buyer to purchase a product of an offshore merchant website using a local currency through the intermediary platform. The buyer places an order at the offshore merchant website, which sends an order request to the intermediary platform. The intermediary platform calculates the purchase amount in local currency, and exchanges the local currency amount provided by the user into an equivalent foreign currency amount through a financial platform, and sends a transaction message indicating successful payment to the offshore merchant website to allow shipping of the product. The intermediary platform periodically conducts accounting and profit sharing operations with the offshore merchant website.

applicant-name.name: ALIBABA GROUP HOLDING CO LTD V

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Online transaction method and online transaction system for realizing off-shore transaction

abstract.p: The invention discloses an online transaction method for realizing an off-shore transaction, which comprises that: (1) a user logs in an off-shore transaction network to transmit selected commodity information
(2) the off-shore transaction network sends a transaction request to an intermediate platform

(3) the intermediate platform receives the transaction request, calculates the amount of intraterritorial currency of the transaction according to a foreign currency exchange rate pricing acquired from a financial platform in advance and displays the amount of the intraterritorial currency ofthe transaction to the user passes through authentication

(4) after receiving the payment confirmation of the user, the intermediate platform operates to change the corresponding amount of intraterritorial currency in a corresponding account of the user into corresponding foreign currency through the financial platform
(5) the intermediate platform sends transaction information on the success of the payment to an the off-shore transaction network, so that the off-shore transaction network can make a delivery
and (6) the intermediate platform and the off-shore transaction network complete liquidation and shared operation periodically.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ONLINE PROCESSING FOR OFFSHORE BUSINESS TRANSACTIONS
TRAITEMENT EN LIGNE POUR DES TRANSACTIONS COMMERCIALES EXTRATERRITORIALE

abstract.p: A method and system for processing offshore online transaction use an intermediary platform to conduct foreign currency exchange on behalf of a buyer and an offshore seller. The method allows the buyer to purchase a product of an offshore merchant website using a local currency through the intermediary platform. The buyer places an order at the offshore merchant website, which sends an order request to the intermediary platform. The intermediary platform calculates the purchase amount in local currency, and exchanges the local currency amount provided by the user into an equivalent foreign currency amount through a financial platform, and sends a transaction message indicating successful payment to the offshore merchant website to allow shipping of the product. L'invention concerne un procédé et système, pour traiter une transaction en ligne extraterritoriale, qui utilisent une plateforme intermédiaire afin de mener un échange de devises étrangères au nom d'un acheteur et d'un vendeur extraterritoriale. Le procédé permet à l'acheteur d'acheter un produit d'un site Web commerçant extraterritoriale en utilisant la devise locale par la plateforme intermédiaire. L'acheteur passe une commande sur le site Web commerçant extraterritoriale qui envoie une demande de commande à la plateforme intermédiaire.

La plateforme intermédiaire calcule le montant d'achat dans la devise locale et échange le montant de devises locales fourni par l'utilisateur en un montant de devises étrangères équivalent par une plateforme financière, et envoie un message de transaction indiquant un paiement réussi au site Web commerçant extraterritoriale pour permettre l'expédition du produit. La plateforme intermédiaire mène périodiquement des opérations de comptabilité et de participation aux bénéfices avec le site Web commerçant extraterritoriale.
